entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers or drizzle. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few showers or periods of drizzle ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming west 40 gusting to 80 early this evening then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early in the evening then changing to periods of light snow after midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h late in the evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
